TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PagerStyle extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供頁面分頁 UI 的樣式功能。

span.span: Provides style capability for the pagination UI of a page.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件是具有其他樣式屬性表單重新編頁使用者介面 (UI) 的特定物件。The object is a object with additional style properties specific to the pagination user interface (UI) of a form. 使用屬性和方法類別，以覆寫預設文字， ，和屬性。Use the properties and methods of the class to override default text for the , , and properties. 例如，如果您以程式設計方式使用適當的頁面的下一個] 和 [上一步連結建立表單，您可以覆寫這些連結的文字設定先前所述的屬性值。For example, if you are programmatically creating a form with Next and Previous links to the appropriate pages, you can override the text for these links by setting the value of the properties previously mentioned. 您可以使用方法，例如， ，或擷取屬性的目前值。You can use methods, such as , , or to retrieve the current value of the properties. > [!NOTE] > 屬性僅適用於 HTML 標記，可能無法在其他標記，例如 WML 中轉譯。The property applies only to HTML markup and may not be rendered in other markups such as WML.

permission.span: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NextPageText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 UI 項目所用的標籤 (Label)，用以巡覽至下一頁。

span.span: Gets or sets the label used for a UI element that is used to navigate to the next page.

summary.span: 預設值為 [下一頁]。

span.span: The default value is "Next".

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

value.span: UI 項目所用的標籤，用以巡覽至下一頁。

span.span: The label used for a UI element that is used to navigate to the next page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標籤可以包含的格式規範`{0}`，這要替換為下一個分頁的頁碼時則會轉譯標籤。The label can include the format specifier `{0}`, which is substituted with the page number of the next page when the label is rendered. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用屬性設定為大於目前頁面的下一個頁面標籤。The following example demonstrates how to the use the property to set the next page label to one more than the current page. ```vb Private Sub Form1_PageIndexChanged(sender As Object, e As EventArgs) Form1.PagerStyle.NextPageText = (Form1.CurrentPage + 1) End Sub ``` ```csharp void Form1_PageIndexChanged(object sender, EventArgs e) { Form1.PagerStyle.NextPageText = (Form1.CurrentPage + 1).ToString(); } ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly NextPageTextKey As Object

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PageLabel { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目前頁面所用的標籤。

span.span: Gets or sets the label used for the current page.

summary.span: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The label used for the current page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此屬性包含空字串，不會顯示標籤。If this property contains an empty string, no label is displayed. 標籤可以包含的格式規範`{0}`和`{1}`，這會取代目前頁面的頁碼與總頁數，分別呈現標籤時。The label can include the format specifiers `{0}` and `{1}`, which are substituted with the page number of the current page and the total number of pages, respectively, when the label is rendered. 例如，格式規範`Page {0} of {1}`會顯示總頁數中目前的位置。For example, the format specifier `Page {0} of {1}` would show the current position within the total number of pages. > [!NOTE] > WML 裝置不會呈現此屬性。WML devices do not render this property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來設定 前往網頁 」 頁面標籤。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to set the page label to "Go to page". ```vb Private Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As System.Object, _ ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles MyBase.Load If Not IsPostBack Form1.PagerStyle.NextPageText = "2" End If Form1.PagerStyle.StyleReference = "title" Form1.PagerStyle.PageLabel = "Go to page" End Sub ``` ```csharp void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e) { if(!IsPostBack) { Form1.PagerStyle.NextPageText = "2"; } Form1.PagerStyle.StyleReference = "title"; Form1.PagerStyle.PageLabel = "Go to page" } ```

span.span: The label used for the UI element used to navigate to the previous page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標籤可以包含的格式規範`{0}`，這取代前一頁的頁碼時則會轉譯標籤。The label can include the format specifier `{0}`, which is substituted with the page number of the previous page when the label is rendered. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性設定為小於目前頁面的前一個頁面標籤。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to set the previous page label to one less than the current page. ```vb Sub Form1_PageIndexChanged(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As EventArgs) Form1.PagerStyle.PreviousPageText = _ (Form1.CurrentPage - 1).ToString() End Sub ``` ```csharp void Form1_PageIndexChanged(object sender, EventArgs e) { Form1.PagerStyle.PreviousPageText = (Form1.CurrentPage - 1).ToString(); Form1.PagerStyle.NextPageText = (Form1.CurrentPage + 1).ToString(); } ```
